author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip | Pic: Scott Disick may be having some split regrets - reposts naked photo of Kourtney Kardashian
text:
This is great news for anyone forced to endure watching KUWTK; Scott is the only watchable thing. And, if himself and Kourtney get back together, that can only mean more Scott in your lives... which can only be a good thing?
Since enjoying a reported French dalliance with an ex a few months back , Scott and the mother of his three children have been apart. But absence makes the heart grow fonder, etc etc, so - now that Scott has had some time for some retrospection, it seems he may be missing the familiar.
He only went and posted this to his Instagram earlier, captioned "Now that's 1 hot mama."
Since its posting three hours ago, the picture has garnered 16,048 comments on Instagram, which can basically be summed up as "OMG THEY'RE BACK TOGETHER." and "Is that even her?"
Yes, it is "her"; it's from a shoot she did with Vanity Fair a couple of days ago.
Love being a part of @brianbowensmith #metalliclife series. Go to http://t.co/WmlHIRY6nF @vanityfair @deregallery pic.twitter.com/Dc3qh7HuBr
â€” Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) October 6, 2015
One can assume Lord Scott did indeed go @vanityfair for more.
